mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT je.job_execution_id) FROM job_executions je LEFT JOIN jobs j ON je.job_id = j.job_id LEFT JOIN job_executions_target_agents jeta ON je.job_execution_id = jeta.job_execution_id

SELECT je.job_id, je.job_execution_no, j.job_name, je.job_history_no, je.job_execution_status, je.execution_user_id, je.execution_date_time, je.start_date_time, je.end_date_time, jeta.ip, jeta.user_name, jeta.start_date_time AS agent_start_date_time, jeta.end_date_time AS agent_end_date_time, jeta.log FROM job_executions je LEFT JOIN jobs j ON je.job_id = j.job_id LEFT JOIN job_executions_target_agents jeta ON je.job_execution_id = jeta.job_execution_id WHERE je.job_id = #{jobId} AND je.job_execution_no = #{jobExecutionNo}
